triples.name: Social robot
triples.relevance: Core subject of the survey examining how social robots interact with humans through voice.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: Conversational agents are dialogue systems that form a key category of agents discussed in the survey.

triples.name: Virtual assistant
triples.relevance: Voice assistants and mobile voice assistants are explicitly mentioned as key embodied AI systems in the survey.

triples.name: Embodied agent
triples.relevance: Embodied AI and agents are foundational concepts for understanding how voice becomes an essential modality of embodiment.

triples.name: Human-AI interaction
triples.relevance: The survey addresses voice-based human-agent interaction as an extension of broader human-AI interaction research.

triples.name: Voice user interface
triples.relevance: Voice user interfaces are the technological foundation enabling voice-based communication in agent systems.

triples.name: Social psychology
triples.relevance: Social psychology theories are used to ground the analysis of the social role of voice in human-agent interaction.

triples.name: Cognition
triples.relevance: Cognitive models of human perception and reaction to agent voice are key theories used in the survey's framework.
